details: Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, and Skype are popular platforms that allow you to create virtual meeting rooms with video and audio capabilities. You can use these platforms for group study sessions.
Google Workspace offers Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides, which enable real-time collaborative editing and commenting on documents.
Platforms like Module, Canvas, and Blackboard are designed for educational purposes and include features for group discussions, file sharing, and collaborative assignments.
